SA11sanss10u:4_0: kiyadbahū dharmaparyāyuṇeyā [[DOUBT]] śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrute namanta /
SA11sanss10u:5_0: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu trāyituṃ duḥśīlayena vrajamāna durgatim //
SA11sanss10u:7_0: tathā hi kulaputrāḥ śrutavataḥ prajñâgamo bhavati /
SA11sanss10u:15_0: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ sagauravāṇāṃ sapratīśānāṃ anyalokadhātusthitâpi buddhā bhagavanto mukham upadarśayanti dharmaṃ cânuśrāvayanti /
SA11sanss10u:20_0: dharmakāmānāṃ vimalatejaḥ bodhisatvānāṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā buddhapratibhānam upasaṃharanti /
SA11sanss10u:22_0: parikṣīṇâyuṣkāṇāṃ buddhā bhagavanto devatāś câyurbalaṃ côpasaṃharanti /
SA11sanss10u:23_0: buddhâdhiṣṭhānena devatâdhiṣṭhānena ca kāṅkṣāmāṇā varṣasahasram avatiṣṭhante //
SA11sanss10u:25_0: yāvat kalpaṃ vā kalpâvaśeṣaṃ vā yāvad vâkāṅkṣanti dharmagauravajātānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto jarām apy apanayanti /
SA11sanss10u:37_0: tasmāt tarhi vimalatejaḥ śrutasaṃbhārakauśalyâbhiyuktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti //
SA11sanss10u:42_0_0: chandâkāram āśayâkāram adhyāśayâkāraṃ prayogâkāraṃ nirmāṇâkāram apramāṇâkāraṃ kalyāṇamitrâkāraṃ gauravâkāraṃ pradakṣiṇâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:42_0_1: suvacanâkāraṃ paryupāsanâkāram avahitaśrotrâkāraṃ manaskārâkāram avikṣepâkāram avasthānâkāraṃ ratnasaṃjñâkāraṃ bhaiṣajyasaṃjñâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:43_0_0: āram atṛptabuddhadharmaśravaṇâkāraṃ tyāgavṛṃhaṇâkāraṃ dāntâjāneyâkāraṃ bahuśrutasevanâkāraṃ satyakṛtyaprītyanubhavanâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:43_0_1: kāyâudbilyâkāraṃ cittaprahlādanâkāram aparikhedaśravaṇâkāraṃ dharmaśravaṇâkāraṃ pratipattiśravaṇâkāraṃ paradeśanāśravaṇâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:45_0_0: hāraśravaṇâkāraṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyaśravaṇâkāraṃ gauravâkāraṃ utpādakauśalyaśravaṇâkāram anutpādakauśalyaśravaṇâkāram aśubhâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:45_0_1: maitryāḥ śravaṇâkāraṃ pratītyasamutpādâkāraṃ anityâkāraṃ duṣkhâkāram anātmâkāraṃ śāntâkāraṃ śūnyatānimittâpraṇihitâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:46_0_0: kārâkāraṃ kuśalâbhisaṃskārâkāraṃ satvâdhiṣṭhānâkāraṃ avipraṇāśâkāraṃ svâdhīnâkāraṃ svacittârakṣaṇâkāraṃ vīryasyâśraṃsanâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:46_0_1: dharmanidhyaptyākāraṃ kleśavipakṣâkāraṃ svapakṣaparikarṣaṇâkāraṃ parapakṣakleśanigrahâkāraṃ saptadhanasamavaśaraṇâkāraṃ sarvadāridryôpachedâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:46_0_2: sarvavidvatpraśastâkāraṃ paṇḍitâbhinandanâkāraṃ āryasaṃmatâkāraṃ anāryaprasādanâkāraṃ satyadarśanâkāraṃ skandhadoṣavivarja-
SA11sanss10u:48_0_0: nâkāraṃ saṃskṛtadoṣaparitulanâkāram arthapratiśaraṇâkāraṃ dharmapratiśaraṇâkāraṃ sarvapāpâkaraṇâkāraṃ ātmaparahitâkāraṃ sukṛtakarmânanutapyanâkāraṃ
SA11sanss10u:50_0: yaś ca dharmasaṃbhārayogaḥ sâivâsya jñānasaṃbhāro bhavati /
SA11sanss10u:51_0: tatra katamo dharmasaṃbhārayogo yêyam alpârthatâlpakṛtyatâlpabhāṣatâlpapariṣkāratā pūrvarātrâpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktasya śrutârthaparitulanatā /
SA11sanss10u:89_0: lokâyataśāstrāṇi daṇḍanītiśāstrāṇi kārkhedaśāstrāṇi vādavidyāśāstrāṇi kumārakrīḍāśāstrāṇi jambhakavidyāśāstrāṇi /
SA11sanss10u:91_0: yāny api tad anyāni kānicin mokṣapratikūlāni śāstrāṇi saṃmohāya saṃvartante tāni sarvāṇi bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitena parivarjayitavyānîti /
SA11sanss10u:92_0: evaṃ śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyaṃ /
SA11sanss10u:93_0: kathaṃ punar āśayasaṃpannasyâpy ugradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛham anujñātaṃ /
SA11sanss10u:96_0: na teṣām asāmarthye 'pi prakṛtiduṣṭatvād gṛhâvāsasya ca prajñaptisâvadyatvād iti //
